page.title: 14HEALTH AND SOCIAL WELFARE
page.content: Harris house is a home for the elderly situated in Harris.The old are cared for by qualified,and unqualified staff who are employed in the home. There is one large home for those elderly who cannot look after themselves.Also around the home there are sheltered houses for the elderly people who can look after themselves quite well.These flats consist of one bedroom,one toilet,one kitchen and a sitting room-come dining room.The District Nurse goes in to see them every day to bath them and tidy up.If in the day they need anything they can pull a cord and speak to staff who will immediately go over to attend to their needs.
